description: Try our easy to follow Portuguese Apple Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Portuguese Apple Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel, core, and thinly slice the apples into rounds about 4mm thick. Toss the apples,1/4 cup of the sugar, the liqueur, and lemon juice in a bowl. Let stand for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, whisk the remaining 1/2 cup sugar, milk, oil, and eggs together in a bowl. Sifting the flour, baking powder, and cinnamon and stir until smooth. Set aside for 30 minutes.

Pour enough oil to come halfway up the sides of a large skillet and heat over high heat to 180°C. In batches, dip the drained apple slices in the batter. Deepfry about 3 minutes, until golden brown. Using a slotted spoon, transfer to paper towels to drain. Serve warm, dusted with confectioner's sugar.
